mapper.select: select picture_address 'slideshowPath', book_id 'goodsId' from picture where is_delete = 0 order by sort_num

select s1.book_id 'goodsId', s1.book_name 'goodsName', s1.picture_id 'goodsImagePath', s1.present_price 'goodsPrice' from goods s1 inner join goodshot s2 on s1.book_id = s2.book_id where s1.is_delete = 0 and s2.is_delete = 0 order by s2.sort_num
